name: Halo: Combat Evolved
description: Halo Custom Edition + Chimera + Refined Maps
notes: If you didn't feel like packaging your Halo install into an installer, alternatively you can copy your entire Halo Custom Edition folder from windows to the drive_c in your wine prefix, doesn't really matter where, just make sure you set Lutris to launch haloce.exe. Other than that, everything should automatically install for you.

task.description: Running setup for Halo CE. Leave paths default and uncheck installing Gamespy Arcade.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please locate haloce_refined_1.0.exe for installtion
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: ~/games/HaloCE/haloce.exe
  prefix: ~/.wineGames/HaloCE
  working_dir: ''
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    description: Installing d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR

    app: d3dx9_24

    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR

- task:

    executable: installer
    name: wineexec

- task:
    description: Installing Halo Custom Edition
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  UseXVidMode: true
  version: system
